sources.title: Panhandle (1948) ROD CAMERON
sources.description:
It's FRIDAY @PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Rod Cameron, Reed Hadley, and Blake Edwards
Writers: Blake Edwards & John C. Champion
Director: Lesley Selander

Saddle up for a tale of revenge as a former Texas lawman turned lightning-fast Gunfighter tangles with a wicked gambler and saloon owner, who runs his town with a gang of hired killers. Watch for Blake Edwards as the trigger-happy Pistolero itching for a fight. Few would suspect the famed filmmaker launched his Hollywood career as a writer and a producer with this rarely seen, but influential western.

metadata.Plot: John Sands (Rod Cameron), formerly a Texas marshal whose talents with guns caused the law to turn against him,is a fugitive in Mexico, when he learns from "Dusty" Stewart (Cathy Downs)that his brother in the Texas panhandle, Billy Sands (John C. Champion), her fianc√© and crusading newspaperman, his been mysteriously murdered in Sentinel, Texas. Despite the price on his head, Sands comes north to the panhandle to find his brother's killer.
metadata.Actors: Rod Cameron, Cathy Downs, Reed Hadley
